thread.title: S&P upgrades Rio Tinto, flags well-placed for M

title: S&P upgrades Rio Tinto, flags well-placed for M
text:
S&P upgrades Rio Tinto, flags well-placed for M&A 9:00am EST - 01:38 
Standard and Poor's has raised its credit rating of global miner Rio Tinto for the first time since 2011 on the back of strong financial results and said the global miner could easily fund a big acquisition. Silvia Antonioli reports   
Standard and Poor's has raised its credit rating of global miner Rio Tinto for the first time since 2011 on the back of strong financial results and said the global miner could easily fund a big acquisition. Silvia Antonioli reports  //reut.rs/2EFT4Ey
